content: k to end row 7 k4 p1 k2 c4f c4b k2 p1 k to end fifth repeat row 1 2 4 5 6 8 k4 p1 k12 p1 k to end row 3 k4 p1 c4f k4 c4b p1 k to end row 7 k4 p1 k2 c4f c4b k2 p1 k to end top cuff row 1-7 *p2 k2 repeat from * bind off in rib thumb transfer 21 thumb stitches to needle then pick up 7 stitches along top of thumb 28 stitches row 1-7 *p2 k2 repeat from * bind off in rib finish weave in all ends wash block wear and be the envy of all ©2009 by weezalana at knittywhipped blogspot com please don t bogart my pattern or use for your own evil gain in other words not for sale profit world domination etc for personal use only and remember be kind and rewind v3 10 01 09
